thread.section_title: Pullman London St Pancras Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Impressive with excellent service!
thread.title_full: Impressive with excellent service! - Review of Pullman London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: neilloft
title: Impressive with excellent service!
text: Rooms very modern and good size. Service is very personalized. Lots of extras in room such as slippers, sewing kit, shoeshine etc. Huge bed and samsung flatscreen tv. Unique hotel being one of only a couple of Pullman properties in the UK. Staff aim to resolve any issues quickly. Just minutes from railway station.
